Keywords: Cosmic , Mystical , Ruler , X-Men
Real Name: James Braddock Jr.
Special Powers
I DO LOVE GIFTS: Monarch starts the game with one hindering, one water, and one blocking terrain marker on his card. // When an opposing character generates terrain, after resolutions you may place a terrain marker of a type they generated on this card.
IT'S ONLY REALITY: FREE: Remove a terrain marker from this card to choose one:
*Generate a terrain marker of that type in a square within range.
*Remove a terrain marker of that type in a square within range.
WITCHBREED KING OF AVALON: Leadership. When Monarch uses it and succeeds, he may immediately remove a terrain marker from his card. If he does, this turn friendly characters adjacent to or occupying terrain of that type are considered adjacent to him.
Trade Monarch Want Monarch

Assuming they are next to the right type of terrain, and he rolls leadership. As he can carry them because they are adjacent, and them place them once he is done moving. Special Witchbreed King of Avalon: Leadership. When Monarch uses it and succeeds, he may immediately remove a terrain marker from his card. If he does, this turn friendly characters adjacent to or occupying terrain of that type are considered adjacent to him.

With that leadership power, there are three main reasons to be thinking of that can make him fun to strategize with. 1. To get some Empower up there without him actually being there. 2. Do get some remote Support healing in, but remember that the target will can't be adjacent to opposing characters. 3. The one you were all waiting for: precision Pulse Wave to "push" your character onto their next click, if you want.
